post.body: turns out Girls Aloud are supporting Coldplay when I see them at Wembley, woo! MOS Sessions = less commercial = good sometimes!
I've been in M83 for a while now! Saturdays=youth is an awesome album. Before the Dawn Heals Us also. Just getting sum older stuf
Head and Shoulders for men!! (if you even have that in the US..)
good luck!
probably coming home either late this week or next weekend... are you all finished for xmas now then? might need a lift home!
hope you're not feeling too rough this morning.. and also, I guess michael told you to send the dirty text :P
how was the exam? U got the results already?! I've just handed in all my work!
sennheiser cx-300, no doubt. Hmv have them at £20 (£10) off. They sound awesome!
thanks for the suggestions, will check them out asap :)
sorry, saw your tweet earlier... Spice Imperial rocks!! I too shall be stocking up on the stuff ASAP :)
thanks, you obviously have good taste in music as well :)
definitely worth the cost then?
listening to M83. Some seriously mind blowing late night electronic emotional ambience.
Really need to start packing my stuff to go home. Such an effort though...
Hmmm Tursday
haha! Awesome photo of the day: http://tinyurl.com/6rwr9q
"One day we're gonna live in Paris. I promise, I'm on it." - Friendly Fires - Paris. LOVE their album at the moment!
Oops... forgot to tweet for a couple of days! Anyways, life after uni work is good, must buy some more xmas presents though :-/ what to get?
Watching Lucky Number Slecon, never seen it!
Im in despair with our Virgin Media connection tonight. Almost giving up loading basic web pages, let alone streaming anything :'(
settling down for a cosy night in, maybe with a dvd or some Little Big Planet :)
Posing in a lift! http://snipurl.com/7yh0h
30 mins later... http://snipurl.com/7tta6
That's it I've finished! Everything handed in and nothing to do til after Xmas! Beer with @inksplat and @wilwhiting http://snipurl.com/7tko0
Has been working for 3 days solid. 10am-2am. No time for any fun or relaxation... UNTIL TOMORROW XD
Wow it's really empty today everywhere! Is everyone lazing at home?
heading to Heathrow to pick up my girlfriend (woo, I finally get her back!)
Just had to snap this photo: (read the back of the bus) http://snipurl.com/95scd
Just got the Ladyhawke album - love it! http://www.last.fm/music/Ladyhawke/Ladyhawke
Who on earth thought of making sauce out of bread?!
Heading out for a brisk boxing day walk through the University Parks by the river. It's cold this morning!
Merry Christmas all, don't eat too much :) http://snipurl.com/93ss9
track Santa's journey around the globe delivering presents: http://is.gd/a4JU
Fancy making $9000 in a single day? Make an iPhone farting app: http://is.gd/deP1
Argh BSOD!! http://snipurl.com/915co
Nooooo Whittard may be about to go bust :'-( where will I get all my amazing tea & coffee?! Sad day indeed. http://tinyurl.com/6sw3bg
Some SERIOUS driving skills: http://tinyurl.com/64naqm
New blog post - My top 10 albums of the year (part one) - check it out: http://tinyurl.com/9f5gzy
just found an awesome free (ad-free) webhost!!
Trying to decide on my top 10 albums of the year for a blog post. It's really tough, so much good music that I've discovered this year!
